item.title: Misc
item.description: Not really code as such, but heres some markdown notes ### Notes Headers # Heading H1 ## Heading H2 ### Heading H3 #### Heading H4 ##### Heading H5 ###### Heading H6 Emphasis _Text_ Displays text in italics **Text** Displays the text in bold **_Text_** Displays the text in bold and italics ~~Text~~ Adds strikethrough effect to the text Lists 1. item1 First ordered list item 2. item2 Second ordered list item ⋅⋅1.

item.title: Terraform
item.description: Warning Need to be careful with terrafrom state. Find a better way to manage failure than destroying and reimporting resources Workspaces TODO Structuring a terraform project TODO Creating terraform modules TODO
